Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
3.
2764Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
2765Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
